帤字的基本解释

帤
rú
大巾。又指手巾。
破旧的巾：“人间纷纷臭如帤。”
弓干上的衬木：“厚其帤则木坚。”

帤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［rú］
［《廣韻》女余切，平魚，娘。］
(1)巾，古代擦抹用的布。亦以指大巾。
(2)特指破旧的脏布。
(3)弓干正中的衬木，为调节强弱之用。

帤字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　帤； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页331第09
【唐韻】女余切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】女居切，?音袽。【說文】巾帤也。一曰幣巾。【揚子·方言】帤，大巾也。嵩嶽之南，?穎之閒謂之帤。亦謂之幪。　又【廣韻】幡巾。【正韻】旛布。　又弓中裨也。【周禮·冬官考工記】弓人厚其帤，則木堅。薄其帤，則需。【註】帤，謂弓中裨。【疏】造弓之法，弓幹雖用堅木，仍於幹上裨之，乃得調適也。

帤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
帤字的起名意思

暂无。

帤
Basic explanation of words
帤
rú
Big scarf. Refers to the towel again.
Dilapidated towel: "The world is stinking like a mess."
Lining wood on the trunk of the bow: "Thickness makes the wood firm."
帤
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [rú]
["Guangyun" female Yuqie, Pingyu, Niang. ]
(1) Towel, a cloth used for wiping in ancient times. It also refers to a large scarf.
(2) Especially worn and dirty cloth.
(3) The lining wood in the middle of the bow stem is used to adjust the strength.
帤
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　帤; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 331 09
[Tang Yun] female co-cut [Jiyun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] female co-cut,? Yin Yu. 【Said the text】women are also. One said coin towel. [Yangtze Dialect] Po, Dajin also. To the south of Songyue, Ying Zhixian is called Po. It is also known as the Yau.　[Guangyun] Banner towel. 【Positive rhyme】Banner cloth.　It's also a bow. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] The bow is thick, and the wood is strong. If you are thin, you need it. [Note] 帤, that is the bow in the Pi. 【Sparse】The method of making bows, although solid wood is used for the bow stem, it is still beneficial to the stem, but it must be adjusted.
帤

帤
Name meaning
Nothing.
rú
сущ.
1) старое тряпьё, ветошь, лохмотья
臭如帤 противный, как старое тряпьё
2) * обвязка (на середине дуги лука)
厚其帤 уплотнить его (лука) обвязку
